description.english: Punish 5000 sinners.
description.russian: Накажите 5000 грешников.
description.german: Bestrafe 5000 Sünder.
description.french: Châtiez 5 000 pécheurs.
description.latam: Castiga a 5000 pecadores.
description.brazilian: Punir 5.000 pecadores.
description.schinese: 惩罚5000名罪人。

description.english: Play 100 power cards.
description.russian: Используйте 100 карт силы.
description.german: Spiele 100 Macht-Karten.
description.french: Jouez 100 cartes Puissance.
description.latam: Juega 100 cartas de poder.
description.brazilian: Jogar 100 cartas de poder.
description.schinese: 打出100张能量牌。

description.english: Purge the final circle.
description.russian: Зачистите последний круг.
description.german: Säubere den letzten Zirkel.
description.french: Purifiez le dernier cercle.
description.latam: Purga el círculo final.
description.brazilian: Purificar o círculo final.
description.schinese: 净化最终层。

description.english: Upgrade a tower to tier 5.
description.russian: Улучшите башню до 5-го уровня.
description.german: Werte einen Turm auf Stufe 5 auf.
description.french: Améliorez une tour jusqu'au rang 5.
description.latam: Mejora una torre a la categoría 5.
description.brazilian: Aprimorar uma torre até a categoria 5.
description.schinese: 把一座塔升到5阶。

description.english: Upgrade a garrison to tier 5.
description.russian: Улучшите гарнизон до 5-го уровня.
description.german: Werte eine Garnison auf Stufe 5 auf.
description.french: Améliorez une garnison jusqu'au rang 5.
description.latam: Mejora una guarnición a la categoría 5.
description.brazilian: Aprimorar uma guarnição até a categoria 5.
description.schinese: 把一支卫队升到5阶。

description.english: Complete all challenges.
description.russian: Пройдите все испытания.
description.german: Schließe alle Herausforderungen ab.
description.french: Terminez tous les défis.
description.latam: Completa todos los desafíos.
description.brazilian: Concluir todos os desafios.
description.schinese: 完成所有挑战。

description.english: Unlock all characters.
description.russian: Откройте всех персонажей.
description.german: Schalte alle Charaktere frei.
description.french: Déverrouillez tous les personnages.
description.latam: Desbloquea todos los personajes.
description.brazilian: Desbloquear todos os personagens.
description.schinese: 解锁所有角色。

description.english: Reach the final circle using only holy damage.
description.russian: Достигните последнего круга, используя только священный урон.
description.german: Erreiche den letzten Zirkel nur mit Heilig-Schaden.
description.french: Atteignez le dernier cercle en utilisant uniquement des dégâts sacrés.
description.latam: Alcanza el círculo final usando solo daño sagrado.
description.brazilian: Alcançar o círculo final usando apenas dano sagrado.
description.schinese: 仅靠神圣伤害抵达最终层。

description.english: Reach the final circle using only unholy damage.
description.russian: Достигните последнего круга, используя только нечестивый урон.
description.german: Erreiche den letzten Zirkel nur mit Unheilig-Schaden.
description.french: Atteignez le dernier cercle en utilisant uniquement des dégâts impies.
description.latam: Alcanza el círculo final usando solo daño profano.
description.brazilian: Alcançar o círculo final usando apenas dano profano.
description.schinese: 仅靠邪恶伤害抵达最终层。

description.english: Reach the final circle using only hellfire damage.
description.russian: Достигните последнего круга, используя только урон адского огня.
description.german: Erreiche den letzten Zirkel nur mit Höllenfeuer-Schaden.
description.french: Atteignez le dernier cercle en utilisant uniquement des dégâts infernaux.
description.latam: Alcanza el círculo final usando solo daño de Fuego Infernal.
description.brazilian: Alcançar o círculo final usando apenas dano infernal.
description.schinese: 仅靠冥焰伤害抵达最终层。

description.english: Purchase a card with credits.
description.russian: Купите карту за деньги.
description.german: Kaufe eine Karte mit Credits.
description.french: Achetez une carte avec des crédits
description.latam: Compra una carta con créditos.
description.brazilian: Comprar uma carta com créditos.
description.schinese: 用积分购买一张卡牌。

description.english: Reach greed without taking any damage.
description.russian: Достигните жадности, не получив урона.
description.german: Erreiche „Gier“ ohne Schaden jeglicher Art zu nehmen.
description.french: Atteignez Avidité sans subir de dégâts.
description.latam: Alcanza Avaricia sin recibir daño.
description.brazilian: Alcançar ganância sem receber nenhum dano.
description.schinese: 不受任何伤害即抵达贪婪。

description.english: Achieve a highscore of 200,000 in Endless mode.
description.russian: Достигните рекорда в 200 000 в бесконечном режиме.
description.german: Erreiche einen Highscore von 200.000 im Endlos-Modus.
description.french: Atteignez un meilleur score de 200 000 en mode Sans fin.
description.latam: Obtén una puntuación alta de 200 000 en el modo sin fin.
description.brazilian: Alcançar o recorde de 200.000 no Modo infinito.
description.schinese: 在无尽模式下获得200,000分。

description.english: Sacrifice 100 cards.
description.russian: Пожертвуйте 100 карт.
description.german: Opfere 100 Karten.
description.french: Sacrifiez 100 cartes.
description.latam: Sacrifica 100 cartas.
description.brazilian: Sacrificar 100 cartas.
description.schinese: 献祭100张牌。

description.english: You checked the box!
description.russian: Вы поставили галочку!
description.german: Du hast das Kästchen abgehakt
description.french: Vous avez coché la case !
description.latam: ¡Revisaste la caja!
description.brazilian: Você marcou a caixa!
description.schinese: 你查看了盒子！

description.english: Beat the hackers minigame.
description.russian: Одержите победу в хакерской мини-игре.
description.german: Löse das Minispiel des Hackers.
description.french: Remportez le mini-jeu des pirates informatique.
description.latam: Supera el minijuego de los hackers.
description.brazilian: Vencer o minijogo dos hackers.
description.schinese: 在黑客小游戏中获胜。

description.english: Fully complete a Shift with John Fenriz.
description.russian: Завершите полную смену со стажером Джоном Фенризом.
description.german: Schließe eine ganze Schicht mit John Fenriz ab.
description.french: Terminez un service complet avec John Fenriz.
description.latam: Completa un turno con John Fenriz.
description.brazilian: Conclua um plantão com John Fenriz.
description.schinese: 与约翰·芬里茨一起全程完成一次轮班。

description.english: Fully complete a Shift with Denny Fox.
description.russian: Завершите полную смену с Денни Фокс.
description.german: Schließe eine ganze Schicht mit Denny Fox ab.
description.french: Terminez un service complet avec Denny Fox.
description.latam: Completa un turno con Denny Fox.
description.brazilian: Conclua um plantão com Denny Fox.
description.schinese: 与丹尼·福克斯一起全程完成一次轮班。

description.english: Fully complete a Shift with Niya Biblyat.
description.german: Schließe eine ganze Schicht mit Niya Biblyat ab.
description.french: Terminez un service complet avec Niya Biblyat.
description.schinese: 与妮亚·比里巴特一起全程完成一次轮班。
description.russian: Завершите полную смену с Нией Библят.
description.brazilian: Conclua um plantão com Niya Biblyat.
description.latam: Completa un turno con Niya Biblyat.

description.english: Fully complete a Shift with Greezy.
description.german: Schließe eine ganze Schicht mit Greezy ab.
description.french: Terminez un service complet avec Greezy.
description.schinese: 与格里兹·戈德堡一起全程完成一次轮班。
description.russian: Завершите полную смену с Гризи.
description.brazilian: Conclua um plantão com Greezy.
description.latam: Completa un turno con Greezy.

description.english: Fully complete a Shift with Unknown.
description.german: Schließe eine ganze Schicht mit Unbekannt ab.
description.french: Terminez un service complet avec Inconnu.
description.schinese: 与未知人士一起全程完成一次轮班。
description.russian: Завершите полную смену с Инкогнито.
description.brazilian: Conclua um plantão com incógnita.
description.latam: Completa un turno con Desconocido.

description.english: Fully complete a Shift with Intern Ruby.
description.russian: Завершите полную смену со стажером Руби.
description.german: Schließe eine ganze Schicht mit Praktikant Ruby ab.
description.french: Terminez un service complet avec Ruby la stagiaire.
description.latam: Completa un turno con la pasante Ruby.
description.brazilian: Conclua um plantão com a estagiária Ruby.
description.schinese: 与实习生鲁比一起全程完成一次轮班。

description.english: Did you really think that would work?
description.russian: Вы, правда, думали, что это сработает?
description.german: Dachtest du wirklich, das würde funktionieren?
description.french: Tu pensais vraiment que ça marcherait?
description.latam: ¿De verdad pensaste que eso funcionaría?
description.brazilian: Você realmente achou que isso funcionaria?
description.schinese: 你真的认为这行得通吗？

description.english: Fully complete a Shift on Torment I with any employee.
description.german: Schließe eine ganze Schicht auf „Pein I“ mit einem beliebigen Angestellten ab.
description.french: Terminez un service complet en Tourment I avec n'importe quel subalterne.
description.schinese: 与任意员工一起全程完成一次“折磨者I”轮班。

description.brazilian: Conclua um plantão no Tormento I com qualquer funcionário.
description.latam: Completa un turno en Tormento I con cualquier empleado.

description.german: Schließe eine ganze Schicht mit Gilbo Gibbins ab.
